title: Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bedroom Suite", May 19, 1934
title_raw: George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bedroom Suite
markings: Office stamp in black ink in lower right corner: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite throughout with dimensions, instructions, materials, etc.; inscribed in graphite in lower right corner: 7903/1" - 1'-0"/RAND, Olssen/MACASSAR EBONY/ENGL. SYCOMORE/BRUSHED CHROM./CLEAR GLASS, 5/19 - 34, 5/20/34, 1, S.H.K.
description: Plans and elevations for bedroom suite of George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand apartment. Double bed at center with macassar ebony base, and macassar ebony headboard behind bed, fastened to wall with two built-in concealed lighting fixtures above bed. Night table and bookshelves to left, night table and telephone to right. Three rounded glass shelves of bookcase connected by vertical brushed chromium tube at left, macassar ebony backing behind shelves. Radio/night table to right of bookshelves with English sycamore on door of upper portion and sycamore on lower door; macassar ebony surrounding front side, and sycamore on top. Radio cabinet at top opens from top down, creating additional surface when open. Moveable shelf inside lower cabinet. At right of bed is telephone cabinet and radio cabinet. Top cabinet for telephone opens from top down. Lower cabinet holds bell box for phone with moveable shelf.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "George C. and Eleanor Hutton Rand Apartment: Bedroom Suite", May 19, 1934. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1842.
